title: directory traversal attacks
extract: What is a Directory Traversal attack? Properly controlling access to web content is crucial for running a secure web server. Directory traversal or Path Traversal is an HTTP attack which allows attackers to access restricted directories and execute commands outside of the web server's root directory.
extract_html: What is a Directory Traversal attack? Properly controlling access to web content is crucial for running a secure web server. Directory traversal or Path Traversal is an HTTP attack which allows attackers to access restricted directories and execute commands outside of the web server's root directory.
